title: Watch Dogs 2 E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Tim and Nick react to the Watch Dogs 2 E3 2016 Trailer!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino

transcript_chunks.text: E3 2016 is happening kind of funny is going all out with Let's Plays and reaction videos all week long subscribe now at youtube.com/ kind of funny games to not miss a thing what's up guys I'm Tim Gettys this is Nick scarpino this is more of kind of funny games E3 2016 coverage we're about to look at the Watchdogs 2 trailer that came out about a week ago before E3 this was kind of like things were leaking for this game forever but then finally bam they're like here it is it's announced it's coming out November 15th cool Nick yes I wanted to show you haven't seen this trailer I hav't seen yet I I didn't play watch dos one neither did I it looked cool mhm when they show when I saw it D3 it looked dope that was years ago years AG 12 I think I'm like this looks great I'm definitely going to play this I never played it yeah I can I funny cuz then I saw the division I was like that looks awesome I'm never going to play that and I actually played the division well the cool thing about watch
